MS.S: Cross-platform Console Gui Tools for PowerShell

# Release Notes_x000D__x000A_## v0.7.6_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fix child expand #223_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.7.5_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Adds Show-ObjectTree cmdlet #179_x000D__x000A_* Fix clear last line on Windows Terminal Issue again #207_x000D__x000A_* Adds support for -Diagnostic switch to Out-ConsoleGridView #208_x000D__x000A_* Adds support for -UseNetDriver switch to Out-ConsoleGridView #208_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.7.4_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fixes last line not cleared on exit in WT by updating to Terminal.Gui v1.13.5 #205_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.7.3_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Build updates and compliant release pipeline #168_x000D__x000A_* Updates ConsoleGuiTools to Terminal.Gui v1.10 #184_x000D__x000A_* Fixes #175. Column headers misaligned #185_x000D__x000A_* Fixes# 148. Move to next row on select #187_x000D__x000A_* Fixes #174. Changing Filter does not undo previously marked items #186_x000D__x000A_* Marked are now at top; simplified code; fixed margin #188_x000D__x000A_* Fixes #189 - Fixed typo in exception text. Added -verbose to launch.json #190_x000D__x000A_* Fixes #195 - Incompatible with OpenSUS #196_x000D__x000A_* Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.3 #198_x000D__x000A_* Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.3 #200_x000D__x000A_* Bump Microsoft.PowerShell.SDK from 7.2.6 to 7.2.13 #199_x000D__x000A_* Bump Terminal.Gui from 1.13 to 1.13.4 #197_x000D__x000A_* Remove PDB files from module #201_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.7.2_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Update Terminal.Gui to v1.7.1 #161_x000D__x000A_* Filter edit chops off first char of filter string passed on command line #151_x000D__x000A_* Color changes and terminal becomes unreadable #150_x000D__x000A_If items are selected, then a filter is applied, items now hidden stay selected #121_x000D__x000A_* Add UI for select-all/select-none #120_x000D__x000A_* Add ability to minimize UI #116_x000D__x000A_* Initial focus should be on the results (ListView) #87_x000D__x000A_* Import-Module causes warning on PowerShell 7 RC3 #44_x000D__x000A_* Runaway process on Ubuntu 20.4 displaying random characters upon exit. #139_x000D__x000A_* PSAnsiRenderingFileInfo causes display issues with Out-ConsoleGridView #159_x000D__x000A_* Removes building and distribution of Out-GridView and the other Avalonia-based components_x000D__x000A_* Remove ANSI escape sequences from property values #158_x000D__x000A_ _x000D__x000A_## v0.7.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Upgraded to PowerShell 7.2 and .NET target framework `net60`_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updated Terminal.Gui to 1.7_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Fixed #131 - Strip ANSI_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.3_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Unreleased!_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.2_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Update Terminal.Gui to 1.0._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Disable mouse mode to fix bug with mouse movement being printed to console._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Gracefully fail when running in remote sessions._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Fix off-by-one error with ellipsis so columns should be better aligned._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Now supports `-Filter` parameter._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updated to use the final release of `Terminal.Gui` v0.90 (which is feature complete for 1.0)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.5.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_`Out-ConsoleGridView` has been totally refactored!_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_First off, no more silly F9 menu to accept!_x000D__x000A_All you have to do is hit `ENTER` to accept your selection or `ESC` to cancel._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Also, `-OutputMode` works as expected now. `Single` lets you only select one item. `Multiple` is the default._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.4.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fix filter indexing to return correct selected objects_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.4.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Regex filter_x000D__x000A_* Newlines rendering fix (Thanks @tig!)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.3.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Windows OS support (PS 6.2+)_x000D__x000A_* dynamic column widths_x000D__x000A_* Fix arrow key issue on non-Windows_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.2.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Initial Release
Cross-platform Console Gui Tools for PowerShell
